name: Gray Mind
description:
"In a world, where cyborgs have risen and warriors have fallen, one man attempts to save one world, but in the end, all they can do...  ...is RUN!!!"

This game was produced as a college work at Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais, located in Brazil.  This work was carried out with love, and in the end, we were very proud of the result,  so we decided to share it with the world!

Our team consists of 5 students, and we are eager for your comment and feedback.

❤️❤️❤️

The Team:

Rodrigo Vieira - Project Manager, Game Designer & Programmer

Roberto Ferri - UI Designer, Level & Character Designer

Laura Maria -  Level & Character Designer

Pedro Correa -  Level & Character Designer

Débora Chaves -  Level & Character Designer
